atk-s0402a56:2_0: 201. Pañcamassa paṭhame asappurisanti lāmakapurisaṁ tucchapurisaṁ mūḷhapurisaṁ avijjāya
atk-s0402a56:2_1: andhīkataṁ bālaṁ. Asappurisataranti atirekena asappurisaṁ. Itare dve vuttapaṭipakkhavasena
atk-s0402a56:2_2: veditabbā. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Yathā cettha, evaṁ ito paresu pañcasu. Etesu
atk-s0402a56:2_3: hi paṭhamaṁ pañcaveravasena desitaṁ, dutiyaṁ assaddhammavasena, tatiyaṁ kāyavacīdvāravasena,
atk-s0402a56:2_4: catutthaṁ manodvāravasena, pañcamaṁ aṭṭhamicchattavasena, chaṭṭhaṁ dasamicchattavasena.
atk-s0402a56:4_0: 207-210. Sattame pāpanti lāmakaṁ saṁkiliṭṭhapuggalaṁ. Kalyāṇanti bhaddakaṁ anavajjapuggalaṁ.
atk-s0402a56:4_1: Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Aṭṭhamepi eseva nayo. Navame pāpadhammanti lāmakadhammaṁ.
atk-s0402a56:4_2: Kalyāṇadhammanti anavajjadhammaṁ. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Dasamepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a56:4_3: Imasmiṁ vagge dasasupi suttesu agāriyappaṭipadā kathitā. Sacepi sotāpannasakadāgāmino
